value.title: Power BI Tooltips and report performance
value.excerpt: Patrick looks at a customer scenario where he found Power BI tooltips causing report performance issues. He shows how to identify and then a possible solution.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

value.title: Power BI Tutorial - Grow up Power BI Desktop to Analysis Services (Learning the clicks)
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick will show you how you can grow up a Power BI Desktop file (PBIX) to Analysis Services. He's all about learning the clicks! This is a Power BI tutorial worth watching!  You can build your model within Power BI Desktop and then use Azure Analysis Services to migrate to

value.title: Power Query! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI

value.title: REPLAY Special end of year stream w/ Will Thompson (Dec 12, 2020) *Charity Stream*
value.excerpt: Join us live as we answer your questions about Power BI!   Every time the answer is "It depends", Will will donate $25 to charity! You can take part as well by donating through the live stream. Guy in a Cube is supporting the World Central Kitchen to help feed those affected by Hurricane Iota and COVID-19.
